ygData.subject: Reclaim Energy
ygData.msgSnippet: Starting 2 nights ago, my Reclaim Energy stopped working. I tried to cast it to get rid of my pet, the spells would fade as they normally do when casting, the
ygData.messageBody:
Starting 2 nights ago, my Reclaim Energy stopped working.
I tried to cast it to get rid of my pet, the spells would fade as they
normally do when casting, the casting time meter would briefly flicker
then disappear.
The spell would never actually cast though.
No fizzles, no interruptions.
Last night, i took it out, then hit meditate and tried to re-mem it. It
said i started to memorize Reclaim Energy, the red bar would drop all
the way down, but then it would just sit there. It would never finish
and no icon would show up in my memorized spell section.
My necro friend tried hers, and it worked fine.
When i tried this i was in Befallen, i havent tried it outside of there
yet.
But i am wondering if anyone else has had this problem.

Regarless, as soon as im on tonight, i'll be filling out a bug report.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
